channel.title: Help port forwarding with netgear router please
channel.description:
Hello ,
I got a running server , and im using Hamachi . But i got a Netgear Router , and i can't figure out how to port forwarding :confused: . I did read the tutorials , but i can't find any tutorial for Netgear Router .. I do know how to get on to my default gateway thingy by entering my ip in the web browser , but i don't know what to do after ... So especially the people Who got Netgear Router Please Help.. By the way i got my no-ip as well..
